name: kube-apisix-linkerd-ory-kustomize
description: This is an example to deploy apisix as gateway with linkerd and the ory stack using kustomize

scripts.kube:vault:init: kubectl exec -it vault-0 -n vault -- vault operator init -key-shares=1 -key-threshold=1 -format=json > vault-keys.json
scripts.kube:vault:unseal: kubectl exec -it vault-0 -n vault -- vault operator unseal $(cat vault-keys.json | jq -r '.unseal_keys_b64[0]')

author: iverly <github@iverly.net>
